entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
